page.title: 12Places of Worship in Turvey
page.content: There are 3 places of worship in Turvey. The Parish Church of All Saints, which celebrated it's millenium in June 1981. The United Reform Church built in 1828, which has now closed and the Priory of Our Lady of Peace at Turvey Abbey. Church life is ecumenical, many important services in the church calendar are shared. (Easter, Harvest and Christmas) This year the Church held a service to celebrate Mother Prioress'50 years since ordination. When the Dom died at Easter his body was transported from the Abbey to Church on the bier for the funeral service. The lady who is the surviving member of the Higgins family is Patron of Turvey Church.
